briefTitle: EDG004 Treatment of Adult Patients With Generalized Anxiety Disorder (GAD)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Men and women between the ages of 18-65 years and
* Diagnosed with GAD and
* No other psychiatric conditions, and are otherwise medically healthy.

Exclusion Criteria:

* Women who are pregnant or lactating.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Hamilton Anxiety Rating Scale (HAM-A) Total Score at Visit 7 (Day 42)
outcomeMeasures.description: HAM-A Total Score was rated by the clinician. Scores range from 0 to 56. A lower score is favorable. Baseline was defined as the last non-missing value prior to receiving double-blind study drug.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in the Clinical Global Impression-Severity (CGI-S) Score at Visit 7 (Day 42)
outcomeMeasures.description: Measured on a 7-point scale 1 = Normal, not at all ill; 2 = Borderline mentally ill; 3 = Mildly ill; 4 = Moderately ill; 5 = Markedly ill; 6 = Severely ill; 7 = Among the most extremely ill. Baseline was defined as the last non-missing value prior to receiving double-blind study drug.
